name: Mj Kaser
text: I just got a call from one of the team members and im 12 get your numbers right. I hope this is a good airport though.

name: Dale Ingle
text: The line guys could be more helpful with bags when the customers first show up, I had to get my own baggage cart, load my own bags from the car, the pilots had to take the cart to the plane and load the bags buy themselves. We’re a Netjets customer and the service should always be better than what we received today. We fly into Huntsville once a month it always seems confusing dealing with line and customer service

name: Robert Murphy
text: Great service fast and friendly

name: A S
text: Great coffee and snacks fast service

name: David Grimes
text: I provide transportation quite frequently to passengers who fly in and out of here.   All of the staff are ALWAYS courteous and extremely accommodating.

name: Chris
text: The LSTs are top notch and the CSRs are pros.

name: Chris (CrewRest)
text: If you're not a corporate jet, it's too expensive for you.

name: Rod Allison
text: Arrived for a quick pax pickup in a small GA plane with absolutely no support, no marshaler, no chalks, and no “hello” when I walked in the door. Did a quick hello to the pax and then the girl behind the desk would not allow us to leave without paying an ridiculous “Handling Fee even with no “handling” provided.  Unfortunately they are the only FBO on the field so they can set their own rules.  In the end, it is no surprise that FBOs like Wilson are scoring so high with customer support at other airports.  Signature folks do not care and actually prefer that small planes not show up!

name: Jesse J.
text: This is a fantastic operation. Cannot rate highly enough. It is built for military aviators transitioning to civilian life, but you will feel right at home no matter where you come from. Thanks for the hospitality and awesome training!

name: Mike Krysinski (K8)
text: As a USAF helicopter pilot, Sanders was able to take me from zero multi-engine hours, to earning my Commercial AMEL, my AMEI, and ultimately my ATP-AMEL in just three weeks (~50 hours total). I highly recommend them, especially for those looking for a rotary-transition program!

name: Darrell Jones
text: Great place ..  thanks

name: Mark Perko
text: Outstanding training, facilities and instruction.  I had a unique situation for what I wanted and they were one of few places that knew what I needed and how to get there.  Very professional, and service was outstanding from everyone involved!  Highly recommend Sanders!  Will definitely use them again for any other training I need.

name: B T
text: Great service and hospitality. Thank you for the coffee and conversation! Hope to be back soon!

name: Paul Baker
text: Outstanding place to do some flying training. Super laid back atmosphere with a great bar to wind down after your flight with a beer. Highly recommend their ATP course for a super convenient one stop shop with minimal stress if you’re a military pilot looking to finally knock out your ATP.

name: Brady Cummins
text: Sanders Aviation is a first class organization and I highly recommend it for any and all aviation training. I completed my commercial multi add-on, ATP-CTP, and ATP practical there. The operations, maintenance, aircraft availability, instructors, and check ride experience were all top notch. I am lucky enough to live within driving distance of Jasper but wouldn’t hesitate to recommend flying in from anywhere in the country to get your training done here.

name: Cory Gassaway
text: The is a first class organization. Gordo and his team will give you professional training and make sure you are well prepared for any check rides you need. Cannot recommend them enough! Coordinated well during a changing environment and helped me change classes when I needed to cancel my first scheduled class. Bunk houses are better than anything you’ll find in town. Clean and convenient. If you need aviation training, especially for ATP, this is the only place to go.

name: Jack Jessop
text: Great flight school.  Extremely friendly staff, great facilities, and excellent instruction.  Awesome program for military ATP-CTP and practical package.  Really enjoyed my time there.

name: Z K
text: Highly recommend Sanders to get your ATP-CTP certification, particularly for military flyers.  Gordo and his team have an perfect one-stop shop that takes a little under 2 weeks.

name: Casey D
text: I highly recommend Sanders Aviation for all your flight training needs.  They are professional, safe and well organized.

name: Daniel Knauss
text: Great training, great instructors!  I just finished my checkride for my ATP with Gordo.  They ensured i was prepared with all of the info and skills i would need to get my ticket.  The on-site bunkhouse was convenient, affordable, and clean.  I would highly recommend to anyone looking to complete any kind of flight training!

name: Kyle Craton
text: I did my ATP training here. Great experience!!

name: Matthew Daugherty
text: Absolute professionals!! Great team, great instructors, and all around best package for Mil-to- ATP-CTP.

name: gth872q
text: Smooth operation, great people. MIL-ATP/CTP.

name: Brian Elmerick
text: Sanders Aviation was an extremely well-run ATP training program and I would highly recommend it to any military pilot looking to finish their ATP.

name: Alamo Family
text: Great Family owned business that is willing to help you achieve your goals. Recommend this training center to anyone.

name: Ryan Lawrenz
text: Great training done by highly professional people.   Strongly recommend!

name: Ryan Culbertson
text: I can't recommend this company enough.  If you need ANY type of aviation training, call Sanders Aviation immediately.  The are courteous, professional, and knowledgeable.

name: Josh
text: Great ATP course!

name: Scott Suttle
text:
(Translated by Google) Nice FBO

(Original)
Nice FBO

name: Matt Davidson
text: Josh and Bob at night are very attentive and on top of things.

name: matthew schaffer
text: Great friendly staff. Service and excellence that you expect from Atlantic Aviation.

name: John Chambers
text: These guys are the best! They have been so helpful with us the last few trips! Always trying to please!

name: Dwayne Miller
text: Friendly staff great service

name: Yaya Diallo
text: Atlantic Aviation West in Birmingham is fantastic. We flew in a twin Cessna and received superb customer service. I rented an SUV and forgot my jacket in the back seat. I called and spoke with Lindsey who assured me that they will mail it to me. Surely enough, I received it two days later via overnight shipping on the company's account. I cannot speak highly enough of the customer service we received there. Keep it up!

name: Robert Ditto
text:
Awesome place.  Customer service +++
We'll be back

name: Anthony Cornelius
text: Always friendly staff

name: Brian Harmon
text: Friendly staff but the facilities are a tad dated.
